anya-e1214n4:3_0: Sivu tantūnasantāne khī khaye khā pakāsane;
anya-e1214n4:5_0: Kā-gā sadde (pi) ghā gandho’pādāne ruca rocane,
anya-e1214n4:6_0: Kaca dityaṁ muca moce (atho) vica vivecane;
anya-e1214n4:8_0: Rañja rāge sañja saṅge khalane majja suddhiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n4:9_0: Yujo samādhimhi lujo vināse jhā vicintane;
anya-e1214n4:11_0: Tā pālane chidi dvedhākāre mida sinehane,
anya-e1214n4:14_0: Sida pāke padagate vida sattā vicintane,
anya-e1214n4:15_0: Dī khaye supane dā (ca) dāne dātva’vakhaṇḍane;
anya-e1214n4:18_0: Kudha kope sudha soce rādha hiṁsāya siddhiyaṁ;
anya-e1214n4:21_0: Vidha vedhe gidha gedhe rudhi āvaraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n4:24_0: Sinā soce kupa kope tapa santāpa pīṇane;
anya-e1214n4:26_0: Lupacchede rupa nāse pakāse dipa dittiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n4:27_0: Dapa hāse labha lābhe lubha gedhe khubho cale;
anya-e1214n4:32_0: Lī silese dravīkāre vā gatī bandhanesu (ca,)
anya-e1214n4:39_0: Susa sose bhasa adhopāte nasa adassane;
anya-e1214n4:40_1: Sā’ssāde sā’vasāne (ca) sā tanūkaraṇe (pi ca) hā cāge muha vecitte naha sajjanabandhane naha soce pihicchāyaṁ siniha-saniha pītiyaṁ.
